chapters.title: Chapter 1:  Eastward the Wind Blew
chapters.info: Dannil Lewin, p. 78—Young man from Emond's Field, now a leader of Perrin's soldiers from the Two Rivers. A bean-pole of a man with a thick mustache. He is Tell's brother. He also leads all of Perrin's troops when Tam is absent. See also al'Seen, Bandry.
